alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 19 at 3:24AM HST until December 21 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR ALL HAWAIIAN ISLANDS THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR HALEAKALA SUMMIT THROUGH 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 70 to 100 mph with higher gusts today. Winds will then turn westerly and gradually weaken Tuesday through Tuesday night. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
